description:
Enjoy precise, light effort shifting. Redesigned to improve tire clearance and reduce the force needed to make a shift, the Ultegra front derailleur now features a cable tension adjustment at the derailleur. You'll be able to get rid of the inline adjuster on your shift cable and remove a potential water entry point at the same time.

  • Band mount
  • Wide inner link design
  • Compatible with 11-speed cassettes
  • Top gear range is 53T
  • Maximum capacity is 16T
  • Chain line 43.5mm
  • 28.6mm/31.8mm clamp size
name: Shimano Ultegra FD-R8000 11 Speed Front Derailleur
